title: Daredevil One Shots
description:
Daredevil is a fictional character, a comic book superhero in the Marvel Comics Universe. Created by writer-editor Stan Lee and artist Bill Everett, with an unspecified amount of input from Jack Kirby,[1] the character first appeared in Daredevil #1 (April 1964).

Daredevil is notable as being among the few superheroes with a disability, being blinded as a youth in a radioactive accident that also drastically heightened his remaining senses and gave him a "radar-sense" allowing him to perceive his surroundings. His public identity is Matt Murdock, a successful attorney-at-law.

Although Daredevil had been home to the work of many legendary comic-book artists ÃƒÂ¢?? Everett, Kirby, Wally Wood, John Romita, Sr., and Gene Colan, among others ÃƒÂ¢?? it is Frank Miller&#039;s influential tenure on the title in the late 1970s and early 1980s that is best remembered, cementing the character as a popular and individual part of the Marvel Universe. 

Originally I intended it to be Daredevil Miniseries and One Shots, but thought dividng it would be a better idea. This torrent contains:
1.Daredevil & Batman-King of New York
2.Blood of Tarantula
3.Daredevil-Born Again
4.Daredevil Black Widow Abbatoir
5.Daredevil Movie
6.Daredevil Visionaries-Frank Miller
7.Handbook of Marvel Universe-Daredevil

Born Again and Daredevil Visionaries are a series of Daredevils story arc presented in single graphic novel format. Enjoy and Seed.
